```{r}
# Function to get the new subject id
Get_New_Subject_ID = function(data_temp) {
  old = factor(data_temp$Subject)
  new_sub = paste0("S", 1:length(levels(old)))
  names(new_sub) = levels(old)
  return(data.frame(new_sub))
}



```
